name: COMPLETE DOUBLE SLALOM
description:
DOUBLE SLALOM 

A slalom from left to right solving quiz! 24 exagons for 24 questions, divided in three categories: easy, medium and hard.Yuo have 5 minutes to complete the slalom.  Push a blue hex to load the multiple choice question: you must move from left to right... Your path must not cross black hexagons, caused by your wrong answer. 

The questions are set within the game, but you can import them from external text file ("domande.txt").

Double slalom was a quiz  game, very popular in italian TV.
